name: Rail Gun - LD47
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 47 game jam.

Theme "Stuck in a Loop"

Use the mouse to aim and the left mouse button to shoot.  You can toggle the music off with "M" and restart the current level with "R"

The goal is to get all the objects into the spinning target in as little time and as few shots as possible.  This is made difficult by the fact that your gun is stuck on a looping rail that never stops.  My best time and shot count is 6:52 in 171 shots.  Can you beat me?

Fellow LD jammers: Please rate and comment with your thoughts and I will reciprocate.  Constructive criticism is welcome.  Thanks in advance!

Software Used

Unity, Blender, FL Studio, Audacity, Garageband, Photoshop.
